sentences.en: " Give me 1643, " he called to Central , after looking up the Michigan Central depot number.
sentences.cn: “ 请接1643, " 他查到了密执安中心火车站的号码后,对总机说.

sentences.en: A match is sufficient to set ablaze the lumber yard or the oil depot.
sentences.cn: 要使木材堆放处或石油储存库燃烧,一根火柴就够了.

sentences.en: Across the black slow water he could just make out the naval depot ship.
sentences.cn: 隔着一片黑魆魆的沉滞的海水,他刚刚能分辨出海军仓库船.
这是你们的粮食仓库 吗 ?

sentences.en: It'seems that not all fat is simply a depot for the accumulation of surplus energy.
sentences.cn: 并非所有脂肪都是剩余能量的积蓄.

sentences.en: Rhett was waiting for her at the depot with the carriage.
sentences.cn: 瑞德带着一辆马车在车站等候她.

sentences.en: The ammunition depot is heavily guarded.
The carrier may discharge the goods into any depot.
sentences.cn: 承运人可将货物卸入任何仓库.

sentences.en: The depot is only a few blocks from here.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车站离这儿只有几个街区.

sentences.en: The lorry driver loaded up at the depot.
The military depot has a plentiful supply of food.
sentences.cn: 这个兵站有富足的食品供应.

sentences.en: The truck depot last night went well.
sentences.cn: 昨天夜里卡车站干得不错.

sentences.en: They leased the building as a depot.
sentences.cn: 他们租用这栋大楼作仓库。

sentences.en: To clear ground , the Nuremberg streetcar depot had to be removed.
sentences.cn: 要想廓清场地, 纽伦堡电车总站必须迁移.

phrases.tran_cn: 家得宝（美国家居连锁店）；机务本段，（机车）基本段
办公用品（公司总部设于美国）

trans.tran_cn: 仓库，车库，公共汽车站，火车站
trans.tran_en: a place where goods are stored until they are needed
